snippet: After the victory celebration at MetLife Stadium, the Giants have some difficult decisions to make in the off-season about players like Brandon Jacobs and Osi Umenyiora.
abstract: New York Giants bask in the euphoria of their Super Bowl victory with tens of thousands of fans during a parade in Manhattan's Canyon of Heroes and a rally in New Jersey's MetLife Stadium; will soon have to face sobering off-season decisions about key players like Brandon Jacobs and Osi Umenyiora.
lead_paragraph: After the victory celebration at MetLife Stadium, the Giants have some difficult decisions to make in the off-season about players like Brandon Jacobs and Osi Umenyiora.

headline.seo: Back in New Jersey, a State of Euphoria for the Giants
headline.main: For Giants, a State of Euphoria
headline.print_headline: For Giants, a State of Euphoria
